errors.guild_only: This command can only be used in servers
errors.nsfw_only: This command can only be used in NSFW channels
errors.voice_required: You must be in a voice channel
errors.bot_voice_required: The bot must be in a voice channel
errors.permission_required: You don't have permission to use this command
errors.bot_permission_required: The bot doesn't have the required permissions
errors.cooldown: Please wait **{time}s** before using this command again
errors.same_voice: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot
